revised_title: In Memoriam: Celebrating the Lives and Contributions of Notable Scientists
tldr: This address by Sir Ernest Rutherford commemorates the lives and achievements of several notable scientists who passed away in the previous year. The article highlights their contributions to various fields, including physics, chemistry, engineering, and earth sciences. It also emphasizes their impact on the scientific community and their dedication to advancing knowledge and research.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies and Obituaries
